"1. Enter your name for the quiz.
2. Enter your valid mail address. eg: abc@xyz.com
3. Now set your password for security purpose.
Enjoy the app! â˜º
Bible Trivia is a smart app which is designed with simple and optimized user interface. QuizBook has all the categories of quiz question which are used in daily life.

Hey there! Take a look at the app developed by Brian Kimathi.

Here is the link to the app:
\n\nSteps: click on Trivia.apk and then click on download.
